document.full_text: a commercial airline pilot has been indicted on charges of flying drunk while serving as first officer in the cockpit of a united express flight from austin, texas, to denver in december of 2009.
document.title: airline co-pilot charged with flying drunk
lines_and_colors: a commercial airline pilot has been indicted on charges of flying drunk while serving as first officer in the cockpit of a united express flight from austin, texas, to denver in december of 2009.
